name: crash-site
description:
You're standing near the West car park.
It looks like a scene out of a disaster movie.
There's debris everywhere and a smell of burning plastic, aviation fuel and barbecues.
From somwhere in the wreckage of what was once a small plane you can hear a low moan.

inventory.name: wreckage
inventory.detailedDescription: A tangle of twisted, smouldering metal, plastic, broken glass and bodies.

attributes.smell: The whole area smells like a combination of burned plastic and barbecued hair.
